A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was basically a perfect Star Wars film.\n\nIt did things that no other film before it could do\, specifically because you'd have to be in the position this film is in to do it within the overall stories timeline.  I won't go into detail\, but this film sets the floor for every film to come in the future brilliantly and I can't wait to take the ride again <3
